summary: Play as customized Bionicle character, use bionicle weapons, elemental powers, mask abilites and meet Toa Mata in legendary Codrex!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Contents of plugin:[/size]

[u][b][size=4]6 New Races:[/size][/b][/u]
[list]
[*][b][color=#FF0000]Toa of Fire:[/color][/b]
[u]Available colors:[/u] [color=#FF0000]Red[/color], [color=#800000]Dark red[/color] as basic; [color=#A1A5A2]Grey[/color], [color=#FF8000]Orange[/color], [color=#FFFF00]Yellow[/color] as secondary[u]Magic spells:[/u] Flames, Fireball, Fire breath and Fire Blast (as super talent, that can be used once a day)[u]Abilities:[/u] 100% Resistance of fire, 25 Weakness of ice.[*][b][color=#008000]Toa of Air[/color][/b]
[u]Available colors:[/u] [color=#00BF00]Green[/color], [color=#004000]Dark Green[/color], [color=#40FF00]Lime[/color], [color=#708E7C]Sand green[/color] as basic; [color=#A1A5A2]Grey[/color], [color=#40FF00]Lime[/color], [color=#708E7C]Sand green[/color], [color=#069D9F]Bluish Green[/color] as secondary[u]Magic spells:[/u] Unrelenting Force, Air Volley[u]Abilities:[/u] Higher jumping, Faster speed, Health regeneration on air.[*][b][color=#BFBFFF]Toa of Ice[/color][/b]
[u]Available colors:[/u] [color=#EEEEEE]White[/color], [color=#A1A5A2]Grey[/color], [color=#CCCCCC]Light Grey[/color], [color=#70819A]Sand blue[/color] as basic; and same colors also as secondary[u]Magic spells:[/u] Frostbite, Ice Spike, Frost Breath, Ice Form and Blizzard (as super talent, that can be used once a day)[u]Abilities:[/u] 100% Resistance of frost, and 25% weakness of fire[*][b][color=#0040FF]Toa of Water[/color][/b]
[u]Available colors:[/u] [color=#0080FF]Blue[/color], [color=#0000BF]Dark blue[/color] and [color=#7396C8]Medium blue[/color] as basic; [color=#6D6A6C]Dark Grey[/color], [color=#40FF00]Lime[/color], [color=#7396C8]Medium blue[/color] and [color=#EEEEEE]White[/color] as secondary[u]Magic spells:[/u] Water ball, Water spray and Water Volley and Storm Call (as super talant)[u]Abilities:[/u] Resistance to poisons and diseases, increased heal rate under rain. [*][b][color=#804000]Toa of Stone[/color][/b]
[u]Available colors:[/u] [color=#543324]Brown[/color], [color=#7B5D41]Dark flesh[/color], [color=#D7C599]Tan[/color] and [color=#FF8000]Orange[/color] as basic; [color=#6D6A6C]Dark Grey[/color], [color=#958A73]Sand yellow[/color] and [color=#D7C599]Tan[/color] as secondary[u]Magic spells:[/u] Sand spray, small rocks, boulders, and stone flash[u]Abilities:[/u] Stamina regeneration on clear weather [*][b][color=#111111]Toa of Earth[/color][/b]
[u]Available colors:[/u] [color=#000000]Black[/color], [color=#6D6A6C]Dark Grey and [/color][color=#674ea7]Violet  [/color]as basic; [color=#6D6A6C]Dark Grey[/color], [color=#A1A5A2]Grey[/color] and [color=#333333]Black[/color] as secondary[u]Magic spells:[/u] Earth spray, Ball of earth, Earthquake and Night vision[u]Abilities:[/u] 25% Resistance of fire, 10% light sensitivity (as Vampire), Health regeneration under the ground (and in all interiors)[/list]


[u][b][size=4]New Armor:[/size][/b][/u]
All Toa Armor can be wear only on Toa character!  All armor and masks adopts to main color of Toa.
[list]
[*] 4 types of wrist armor 
[*] 2 types of thig armor
[*] 2 types of shin armor
[*] 2 types of Boots (regular Toa Mata and Pohatu's variant - Advanced boots)
[*] Also, Toa Hands (2 types) and Claws (2 colors), made as gloves (full hand replacement)
[/list]
[u][b]15 Kanohi Masks:[/b][/u]
We made six basic Toa Masks, so you can wear any of them. All masks add magic spell to player when equiped. Use Z key for activate mask ability. Masks only works if you a Toa.
[list]
[*]Kanohi Hau - mask of shielding. Adds a magic shield ability to the wearer. The sheild converts health damage to stamina damage.
[*]Kanohi Kaukau - mask of Water Breathing. Allows the user to breathe underwater
[*]Kanohi Pakari - mask of strength. 
[*]Kanohi Akaku - mask of X-Ray Vision. Adds a x-ray vision ability (modified detect life spell) 
[*]Kanohi Kakama - mask of speed. Encreases speed of player for few seconds. 
[*]Kanohi Miru - mask of Levitation. Encreases player jump height when activated.
[*]Transparent Lime Kanohi Miru - same as regular Miru
[*]Noble Kanohi Huna - mask of concealment. Allows player to become invisible.
[*]Noble Kanohi Rau - mask of translation. Helps to read encrypted messages.
[*]Noble Kanohi Mahiki - mask of illusion. Creates 2 ghost copy of player to distruct enemies. 
[*]Noble Kanohi Matatu - mask of telekinesis. Allows player to telekinetically manipulate objects.
[*]Noble Kanohi Ruru - mask of night vision. Adds night vision ability.
[*]Noble Kanohi Komau - mask of mind control. Adds ability to calm enemies.
[*]Infected Kanohi Hau - same as regular Hau.
[/list]
[u][b][size=4]New Weapons[/size][/b][/u]
[list]
[*]Toa Tahu's Fire Sword,
[*]Toa Kopaka\'s Ice Sword,
[*]Toa Lewa's Axe (in two versions - as war axe and battleaxe)
[*]Toa Kopaka\'s Ice shield (with transparent sectors).
[*]Toa Gali's Hook (works as war axe)
[*]Protosteel Hook
[*]Protosteel Sword
[*]Protosteel Battleaxe
[*]Turaga Vakama's Fire stuff
[*]Turaga Nokama's Water Trident
[*]Turaga Whenua Earth Drill
[*]Turaga Matau's Kau Kau Staff (with rotating blade)
[*]Turaga Onewa's Stone hammer
[*]Turaga Nuji's Ice Pick
[*]Throwing bamboo disks, which can be picked up and used again.
[/list][u][size=4][b]New Quest:[/b][/size][/u]
A small quest will help you become a Toa. During this, you will asked to choose your Toa name, Element, Basic and Secondary color, eyes color. You will go to legendary Codrex, light it up with lightstones and meet Toa Mata themselves!

[b][u][size=4]New Enemies:[/size][/u][/b]
Flying Chaurus Hunters, retextured as Nui-Rama
Avohkahs - electric ghosts, inhabitants of Codrex
Fikou spiders - pecefull Rahi.


[b][size=3]Requirements:[/size][/b]
-TES V Skyrim with Dawnguard and Dragonborn (or Skyrim Legendary Edition)
-SKSE (you can get it for free on Steam or on the official website http://skse.silverlock.org/)
Not supported Skyrim Special edition (not tested)

[b][size=3]Recommendations:[/size][/b]
Strongly recommendedd to disable or remove any mods (if installed) that : 
1) adds new races
2) changes settings of vanilla races
3) changes race/character menu 
4) changes process of mining ore
5) are associated with flight, levitation, etc.

Delete all old files of the previous version of our mod (if installed)
Strongly recommended NOT to use the saves made in old version of the mod

[size=3][b]Running:[/b][/size]
Start the game via SKSE shortcut
If you plan to walkthough Skyrim story quests, then:
﻿start a new game, create a standard character, at the Guardian Stones (on the way from Helgen) read the "Traveller's Diary", follow the quest
If you do not plan to play the story quests, then:
﻿lunch the game, while in the main menu, open the console ("~" on keyboard), type command "coc bioroom", follow the quest
author: Aresnir

files.name: Toa Race plugin
files.changelogHtml:
Added abilities to Toa of Water, so now she can heal herself faster under rain
Added 2 new gloves (lower arms). One in shape of slizer arm, and another in shape of Gali's and Onua's ribbed arms
Slightly improved all tinted boy and armor textures, so tinted colors become more saturate and uniform
Added "Storm Call" - new unique talant to Toa of Water. it similar to voice shout with same name
Added "Clear Skies" spell to Toa of Water. But she can clear skies only from rain and clouds, not snow.

files.name: Toa Race plugin russian
files.changelogHtml:
Added abilities to Toa of Water, so now she can heal herself faster under rain
Added 2 new gloves (lower arms). One in shape of slizer arm, and another in shape of Gali's and Onua's ribbed arms
Slightly improved all tinted boy and armor textures, so tinted colors become more saturate and uniform
Added "Storm Call" - new unique talant to Toa of Water. it similar to voice shout with same name
Added "Clear Skies" spell to Toa of Water. But she can clear skies only from rain and clouds, not snow.

files.name: Toa Races plugin
files.changelogHtml:
Global changes:
• General improvement in the stability of the plugin - eliminated all causes of crash
• A room with canisters of Toa was added to the Toa Sanctuary
• Added Codrex
• Added races menu, which simplifies the process of creating Toa
• Added a quest to become a Toa
• A new kind of sources of light - Lightstone
• Added masks and weapons of Turaga
• Added Mata Nui and Makuta stones
• Added Bionicle symbolism to the Toa Sanctuary
• Added 6 Toa-NPCs that can be companions
• Added new weapons: bamboo disks; silver hooks, axe, sword
• Added new items of armor
• Changed the location of items in the Toa Sanctuary
• Added magic effects of masks
• New spells have appeared, old ones have been improved
• Added Bionicle logo in the main menu

List of changes v1.5:

Global changes:
• Added 2 new rooms to the Toa Sanctuary
• Added Fikou, Avohkahs
• 2 new unique masks
• Added a new type of ore - protodermis
• New skin for pickaxe
• Added the ability to improve weapons and armor
• Added kraft for disks
• A new shorter model for the one-handed axe of Lewa
• Redesigned lighting in Codrex
• The collision of all objects is recast
• Full rebalance of all spells
• Added new spells
• Toa-companions no longer inflict damage on you with their magic
• All English and Russian text has been improved
• Now the shoulders, hands and Toa thighs have the right color (from 1st and 3rd person)
• The shoulders are displayed from the 1st person
• Most weapons are located on the back
• It is now impossible to wear Skyrim armor on Toa, armor and masks from the mod to the standard hero (they are removed after the inventory is closed)
• Fixed a lot of small bugs

Masks:
• Huna - now enemies do not see you in motion
• Kakama - now it does not save from falls from a great height
• Races menu now works more stable - several minor bugs fixed
• Added sound and visual effect to Miru
• Added a visual effect to Kaukau when immersed in water
• Now Akaku does not work on ghosts and Avohkahs
• The visual effect for Ruhu
• The principle of the Mahiki has been reworked
• New visual effect for Mahiki
• Now the masks work only if you are a Toa

Weapon:
• Changed the sound of the staff of Matau
• New model of the behavior of claws
• Added disk counter

Armor:
• Now no one will tell you that you are naked
• Changed the appearance of some items in inventory

Lightstone:
• Lightstones are now normally located in the hand
• Lightstones have become eternal
• The illumination radius is increased
• Lightstones now do not lose light when they are thrown out of inventory

Magic:
• Added "Clear Sky" to Toa of Ice
• Increased the range of flight of a small stone

Toa Sanctuary:
• A cave marker has been added to the map
• Fixed a grid of paths at the entrance to the Toa Sanctuary
• New collision for stone masks and large map
• Corrected the inscriptions on the big map
• The exit from the cave is illuminated
• Chest with brass knuckles removed
• Optimization of lighting
• Improved the work of Races menu, fixed many bugs
• Added sound and visual effect to the Races menu
• Added a warning message to Makuta Stone

Codrex:
• Improved: collision, grid paths
• Floor and other Codrex elements do not vanish on average and low graphics settings
• Lightstones now do not drop out of pedestals
• Fixed a bug: lightstones now do not disappear when loading save
• Added sound when the light is turned on

Companions:
• Companions no longer use bows
• Now the Toa level changes with the player's level
• Now the Toa-companions return to the Toa Sanctuary
